about_the_game:
The Audio Ambience Booster Pack for GameGuru MAX contains over 190 short loopable music tracks, sound and voice effects covering Horror, Sci-Fi, Modern, Future-tech and a range of other genres - giving you a massive boost to your audio collections. Each sound and track has been custom made for this pack and is ideal for game development.

Included in this DLC you'll find:

Horror - creepy - Fantasy

Ambient:

4 Creepy ambient tracks
4 Enigma ambient tracks
5 Peace ambient tracks
1 Crow Forest Ambient background music

Situations:

7 Caution tracks
3 Confront tracks
4 Tension situation tracks
2 Sad moment tracks
3 Surprise moment tracks

Scifi - Modern - Futuristic

Ambient:

3 Abandoned place ambient tracks
1 Conflict ambient
1 Cyber Ambient background music
1 Futuristic Ambient background music
5 Hollow Ambient tracks
3 Space Ambient tracks

Situations:

3 Combat tracks
5 Stealth background music
1 Calm Desert track
1 Alien Contact background music
1 Invasion background music
1 Unknown Signal track

MISC:

7 Game Over tracks
3 Music box tracks
5 Portal sounds
6 Interact Sounds
4 Misc Effects

Sound Effects:

16 Checkpoint Sounds
5 Interact Sounds
1 Barrier Effect

Voice Effects:

12 Interact/Action voices
15 Tips/environment Voices
5 MISC voice lines

legal_notice:
"License Terms for DLC usage:

You have the right to use these DBO files and related texture files in any GameGuru MAX game you create and are free to distribute your games for free or commercially.

You may not distribute any of these files in any format, either singly, as part of an asset model pack, or via any other means, apart from the exceptions stated above.

You may not use these files, in any way, with any other game creation tool (eg Unity, Unreal, etc).
All files, including, but not limited to, 3D Models, Images, Audio, and behaviors, are created by third-party artists and are the sole property of the respective artist.

All files included in the DLC, are licensed to TheGameCreators by the legal copyright holder and are used with permission.
You can contact the author of this asset if you wish to license the model in other formats or for other means.

To esquire about distribution rights, please contact the original author using the information provided."
name: GameGuru MAX Ambience Audio Booster Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: GameGuru MAX Audio Ambience Booster Pack - $29.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy GameGuru MAX Ambience Audio Booster Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: The Audio Ambience Booster Pack contains over 190 high quality audio and musical tracks for your GameGuru MAX creations
